events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred yesterday afternoon involving another vehicle at a busy intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident based on the description involving a collision between two cars.
An agent specializing in auto accident claims was assigned promptly to oversee the case and assist the customer.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed that the process has officially started.
Requested the customer to provide the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and insurance information for the other party.
The customer submitted all requested documents including the police report, detailed photos, and vehicle registration papers.
The claims team began a thorough investigation to assess liability and evaluate the extent of damages to the customer's vehicle.
Investigation concluded with findings supporting the customer's account and verifying the damage estimates from the repair shop.
The claims adjuster proposed a settlement amount that fully covers the repair costs and a rental car during the vehicle repair period.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling of their claim and clarity of communication throughout the process.
The insurance claim was officially approved, confirming coverage will be provided as per the policy terms without any deductions.
Payment covering the repair expenses was issued to the customer's designated account within the agreed timeframe.
The claim was closed successfully after confirming that all outstanding matters were resolved and the customer was compensated.
